mapper.select: WITH recursive p AS (SELECT cate_name, cate_code, cate_code_ref, 1 AS level FROM products_category WHERE products_category.cate_code_ref IS null UNION all SELECT pc.cate_name, pc.cate_code, pc.cate_code_ref, 1 + LEVEL AS level FROM products_category pc INNER JOIN p ON pc.cate_code_ref = p.cate_code) SELECT cate_name, cate_code, cate_code_ref, level FROM p;
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name=#{name}, description=#{description}, cate_code=#{cate_code}, price=#{price}, stock=#{stock} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, user_id, name, p.cate_code, c.cate_code_ref, c.cate_name, price, stock, description, ratingAvg, created_at FROM products p INNER JOIN products_category c ON p.cate_code = c.cate_code WHERE p.id = #{id};

SELECT p.id , user_id ,name, p.cate_code, c.cate_code_ref, c.cate_name, price, stock, description, ratingAvg,cumulative_sales, created_at FROM products p INNER JOIN products_category c ON p.cate_code = c.cate_code
WHERE name like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY cumulative_sales DESC, id DESC
ORDER BY price DESC, id DESC
ORDER BY stock DESC, id DESC
ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC
limit #{skip}, #{amount};

SELECT count(*) FROM products
WHERE (name like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products_image (product_id, file_name, upload_path, uuid) VALUES (#{product_id}, #{file_name}, #{upload_path}, #{uuid});
